schema.title: SaturationFunctionSet
schema.description: A saturation function set is used to describe the relationship between fluid saturations and other properties such as relative permeability and capillary pressure in porous media, which are key factors in determining fluid flow in reservoir rocks. It is an input for the task of reservoir simulation (AKA dynamic reservoir modeling). In OSDU, a reservoir simulation rock physics model and a saturation function set are associated to the ReservoirSimulationModel and assigned to the regions defining the rock properties.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

ThreePhaseRelativePermeabilityModelTypeI.title: Three Phase Relative Permeability Model Type ID
ThreePhaseRelativePermeabilityModelTypeI.description: Identifies the Relative Permeability Model applied for three-phase fluid models if used.

items.title: Saturation Function
items.description: Identifies each saturation function composing the set. Usually saturation functions are uniquely identified in a set by their "usage type".

FunctionUsageTypeID.title: Function Usage Type ID
FunctionUsageTypeID.description: Identifies the type of usage for which the function is designed (such as imbibition, drainage, etc)

BasisOfModelling.title: Basis of Modelling
BasisOfModelling.description: This set of attributes represents the context surrounding the processes selected and used in computing these saturation functions.

CapillaryPressureInputDataCollectionID.title: Capillary Pressure Input Data Collection ID
CapillaryPressureInputDataCollectionID.description: Identifies the Persisted Collection containing relevant data used to derive this Saturation Function Set, except for Samples Analysis, which are identified by CapillaryPressureInputSampleAnalysisIDs. Note that an abbreviation for capillary pressure is "Pc".

CapillaryPressureInputSampleAnalysisIDs.title: Capillary Pressure Input Sample Analysis IDs
CapillaryPressureInputSampleAnalysisIDs.description: Identifies one or more SamplesAnalysis records (namely where SampleAnalysisType = CapillaryPressure.*), used as input for the capillary pressure values in this SaturationFunctionSet data. Note that an abbreviation for capillary pressure is "Pc".

RelativePermeabilityInputDataCollectionI.title: Relative Permeability Input Data Collection ID
RelativePermeabilityInputDataCollectionI.description: Identifies the Persisted Collection containing relevant data used to derive this Saturation Function Set, except for Samples Analysis, which are identified by RelativePermeabilityInputSampleAnalysisIDs. Note that an abbreviation for relative permeability is "Kr".

RelativePermeabilityInputSampleAnalysisI.title: Relative Permeability Input Sample Analysis IDs
RelativePermeabilityInputSampleAnalysisI.description: Identifies one or more SamplesAnalysis records (namely where SampleAnalysisType = RelativePermeability.*), used as input for the relative permeability values in this SaturationFunctionSet data. Note that an abbreviation for relative permeability is "Kr".

ModellingApplicationsUsed.title: Modelling Applications Used
ModellingApplicationsUsed.description: The software applications used in creating this data. Best practice is to also capture the application version.

IntendedWorkflowUsageIDs.title: Intended Workflow Usage IDs
IntendedWorkflowUsageIDs.description: Identifies the subsequent business workflows for which this data is intended to be used.

DatePublished.title: Date Published
DatePublished.description: This represents the date the saturation function set was published and made available to the consumers or downstream applications.

ModellingContacts.title: Modelling Contacts
ModellingContacts.description: Information about the analysts responsible for creating this saturation function set

ModelAreaOfInterestIDs.title: Model Area Of Interest IDs
ModelAreaOfInterestIDs.description: A list of specific areas or business objects within which this model definition can be applied; E.g. Reservoir, ReservoirSegment, or Wellbore.

HasRelativePermeability.title: Has Relative Permeability
HasRelativePermeability.description: Indicates whether relative permeability data has been populated.

HasCapillaryPressure.title: Has Capillary Pressure
HasCapillaryPressure.description: Indicates whether capillary pressure data has been populated.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Free text remarks about this data

ParentModelID.title: Parent Model ID
ParentModelID.description: This is used, as a form of lineage, to explicitly indicate the OSDU record of the SaturationFunctionSet from which this saturation function set was derived. Only to be used in the case that this saturation function set is derived from another.
